content: aluma hat is constructed first with a corrugated ribbing and then a star/diamond repeating pattern it s topped with a fancy crown the pattern is a color-work chart and knitted with just 2 colors at a time the ribbing is knitted with size 2 needles and then the rest of the hat is worked with size 3 needles fits a 22-24 inch head knit picks palette fingering weight 100% wool yarn autumn heather 46 yds cream 76 yds grizzly heather 25 yds coriander heather 36 yds asphalt heather 36 yds
